page.title: 14KINGSBRIDGE SHOW
page.content: THE KINGSBRIDGE AGRICULTURAL AND HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY WAS FORMED IN 1881 WITH THE AIMS OF.... "improving standards...stemming the drift of rural population into industrial towns". It has continued with pauses for wars and depressions ever since and since 1956 has been held at{BOROUGH FARM}on fields adjoining the Totnes road. It has classes for cattle,sheep,horses and Riding,Home Produce,Crafts,Gardening,Wine,Crops and Children 's work. There are events to attract people from all around the area and ion 1985 one of the main themes will be 'YOUTH IN THE AREA'. This show is one of the main Social events of the Kingsbridge area and brings together people from all walks of life.
